post.content:
A leading Internet social portal requires an experienced Project Manager for its downtown Toronto, Canada office.

Position Description:
This position manages R&D teams responsible for the development of the social portal's product line. A combination of technical product management, development project management and team management is required for this role. We are looking for the individual who combines leadership and management skills with a strong sense of technology. The ideal candidate will be familiar with Java and Oracle technologies. Direct reports include software developers, QA staff, and technical writers.

Primary Responsibilities include:
• Overall management of site development teams, including hiring as required, performance management, resource allocation, and salary reviews.
• Work with CTO and Marketing Product department to define release objectives.
• Project planning and tracking.
• Software Development risk assessment.
• Responsible for driving, refining, and supporting the development of best practices within the managed team.

Required Skills:

• 5+ years of software development experience
• 3+ years of management/team lead experience.
• Excellent written and oral communication skills.
• Strong Java, UNIX (including Solaris) and Oracle database experience.
• Significant scheduling and project management experience.
• Experience managing the development of significant software targeted to external customers.

Mind-set:
• Understands people issues
• Process-oriented
• Planner and organizer
• Good communicator (written and verbal)
• Balances long term requirements and short term urgencies

Position Considerations:
This position reports to the CTO.


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Employee
